actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the contribution of the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance.

summary.text: Increases the contributions of the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance from 40% to 55%, and increasing 5% per year until reaching 75% of the average of the subscription charges. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8906(a))

titles.title: A bill to increase the contribution of the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance.
